sentences.en: During a war the interests of the state are paramount, and those of the individual come last.
sentences.cn: 战争时期国家利益是首要的，个人利益置于最后。

sentences.en: For the catalyst producer, catalyst manufacturing cost and material limitations are paramount.
sentences.cn: 对于催化剂制造厂来说, 催化剂生产成本和原料规格限定是最重要的.

sentences.en: God is not subjected to paramount immutable laws of the cosmos.
sentences.cn: 上帝并不受制于至上的,永恒的宇宙法则.

sentences.en: In our work, quality is paramount.
sentences.cn: 我们的工作追求品质至上。

sentences.en: Loyalty is a duty paramount to all others.
sentences.cn: 忠诚比别的义务都重要.

sentences.en: MGM, Paramount, and Columbia are all majors in film industry.
sentences.cn: 米高梅 、 派拉蒙和哥伦比亚都是电影业的大公司.

sentences.en: Nitrogen is of paramount importance to life on earth.
sentences.cn: 氮对地球上的生命至关重要。

sentences.en: She wrote to Paramount Studios and asked if they would audition her.
sentences.cn: 她写信给派拉蒙电影公司，询问他们是否同意让她去试镜。

sentences.en: The importance of correctly choosing paramount field of crop science was emphasized.
sentences.cn: 文章最后还强调了正确选择作物科学优先研究领域的重要性.

sentences.en: The interests of the child are paramount.
sentences.cn: 小孩的利益是最重要的.

sentences.en: The question still remains paramount: Who is the chooser?
sentences.cn: 所以问题依然存在到底谁是选择者?

sentences.en: The safety of the boat and crew becomes paramount.
sentences.cn: 保住潜艇和全艇人员的安全是当务之急.

sentences.en: Their parents can rest assured that their children's safety will be of paramount importance.
sentences.cn: 家长尽可放心，孩子们的安全将成为重中之重。

sentences.en: This duty is paramount to all the others.
This matter is of paramount importance .
Women’s role as mothers is of paramount importance to society.
sentences.cn: 女性作为母亲的角色对社会至关重要。

trans.tran_cn: 最高的，至上的，最重要的，主要的，卓越的，有最高权力的
